languages.text: "Запрос одобрен, как доктринально верный". {n}Паскаль склоняется над существом, и звук активировавшегося бура звучит гневно и яростно. Голос техножреца вскипает лавой, наполняется обещанием небесной кары.{/n} "Да будет прерван Цикл, да будут очищено скверное!"

"Request approved as doctrinally correct." {n}Pasqal leans over the creature and the drill whirrs with wrath and fury. The Tech-Priest's voice boils like lava, ringing with the promise of divine punishment:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued, let corruption be purged!"
languages.original_text: "Запрос одобрен, как доктринально верный". {n}Паскаль склоняется над существом, и звук активировавшегося бура звучит гневно и яростно. Голос техножреца вскипает лавой, наполняется обещанием небесной кары.{/n} "Да будет прерван Цикл, да будут очищено скверное!"

traits.locale_text: "The request is approved as doctrinally correct." {n}Pasqal leans over the creature, and the sound of the activated drill sounds angry and furious. The tech-priest's voice boils like lava, rings with the promise of divine punishment.{/n} "May the cycle be broken, may the impurity be purged!"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The request is approved as doctrinally correct." {n}Pasqal leans over the creature, and the sound of the activated drill sounds angry and furious. The tech-priest's voice boils like lava, rings with the promise of divine punishment.{/n} "May the cycle be broken, may the impurity be purged!"

The Tech-Priest's voice boils like lava, ringing with the promise of divine punishment.{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued, may the impurity be purged!"

traits.locale_text: "Request approved as doctrinally correct." {n}Pasqal leans over the creature and the drill whirrs with wrath and fury. The Tech-Priest's voice boils like lava, ringing with the promise of divine punishment:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued, let corruption be purged!"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「要求は教義上正しいものとして承認された」{n}パスカルが生き物の上に身を乗り出すと、ドリルの音が怒りに満ちて激しく響く。技術司祭の声が溶岩のように沸騰し、神罰の誓いを鳴り響かせている。{/n} 「サイクルを止めよ、腐敗を浄化せよ！」
languages.original_text: "Request approved as doctrinally correct." {n}Pasqal leans over the creature and the drill whirrs with wrath and fury. The Tech-Priest's voice boils like lava, ringing with the promise of divine punishment:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued, let corruption be purged!"

traits.locale_text: 「要求は教義上正しいものとして承認された」{n}パスカルが生き物の上に身を乗り出すと、ドリルの音が怒りに満ちて激しく響く。技術司祭の声が溶岩のように沸騰し、神罰の誓いを鳴り響かせている。{/n} 「サイクルを止めよ、腐敗を浄化せよ！」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “请求符合教义，已接受。”{n}帕斯卡俯下身子，电钻嗡嗡作响，声音听起来充满了愤怒。帕斯卡的声音仿佛沸腾的熔岩，回荡着神圣惩罚的意味。{/n}“让循环终止！让一切腐化之物得到净化！”
languages.original_text: "Request approved as doctrinally correct." {n}Pasqal leans over the creature and the drill whirrs with wrath and fury. The Tech-Priest's voice boils like lava, ringing with the promise of divine punishment:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued, let corruption be purged!"

traits.locale_text: “请求符合教义，已接受。”{n}帕斯卡俯下身子，看着这台机械，电钻的声音听起来充满了愤怒。帕斯卡的声音仿佛沸腾的熔岩，回荡着神圣惩罚的意味。{/n}“让循环终止！让一切不洁之物得到净化！”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Solicitud aprobada como doctrinalmente correcta». {n}Pasqal se inclina sobre la criatura y la perforadora vibra con un sonido furioso e iracundo. La voz del tecnosacerdote resuena furiosa y con la promesa de un castigo divino.{/n} «¡Que se interrumpa el ciclo, que se purgue la impureza!».
languages.original_text: "Request approved as doctrinally correct." {n}Pasqal leans over the creature and the drill whirrs with wrath and fury. The Tech-Priest's voice boils like lava, ringing with the promise of divine punishment:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued, let corruption be purged!"

traits.locale_text: «Solicitud aprobada como doctrinalmente correcta». {n}Pasqal se inclina sobre la criatura y la perforadora suena con rabia. La voz del tecnosacerdote resuena furiosa y con la promesa de un castigo divino.{/n} «¡Que se interrumpa el ciclo, que se purgue la impureza!».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Anfrage akzeptiert, da sie im Einklang mit der Doktrin steht." {n}Als sich Pasqal über die Kreatur beugt, klingt das Summen des Bohrers wütend und wild. Die Stimme des Techpriesters kocht wie Lava. Das Versprechen göttlicher Bestrafung liegt darin:{/n} "Möge der Zyklus unterbrochen und die Verderbnis gereinigt werden!"
languages.original_text: "Request approved as doctrinally correct." {n}Pasqal leans over the creature and the drill whirrs with wrath and fury. The Tech-Priest's voice boils like lava, ringing with the promise of divine punishment:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued, let corruption be purged!"

traits.locale_text: "Anfrage akzeptiert, da sie im Einklang mit der Doktrin steht." {n}Pasqal beugt sich über die Kreatur. Das Geräusch, als sich sein Bohrer einschaltet, klingt wütend, zornig. Die Stimme des Techpriesters kocht wie Lava. Das Versprechen göttlicher Bestrafung liegt darin.{/n} "Auf dass der Zyklus nicht fortgesetzt werde, möge die Unreinheit geläutert werden!"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Demande approuvée, conforme à la doctrine. » {n}Pasqal se penche sur la créature et sa perceuse rugit avec colère et indignation. La voix du technoprêtre se déverse comme de la lave, résonnant de la promesse du châtiment divin.{/n} « Que le Cycle soit rompu, et que cesse la corruption ! »
languages.original_text: "Request approved as doctrinally correct." {n}Pasqal leans over the creature and the drill whirrs with wrath and fury. The Tech-Priest's voice boils like lava, ringing with the promise of divine punishment:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued, let corruption be purged!"

traits.locale_text: « Demande approuvée, conforme à la doctrine. » {n}Pasqal se penche sur la créature et sa perceuse se met à rugir avec encore plus de férocité. La voix du technoprêtre se déverse comme de la lave, résonnant de la promesse du châtiment divin.{/n} « Que le Cycle soit rompu ! Que l'impureté soit purgée ! »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Talebin öğretilerle uyumlu olduğu onaylandı." {n}PYaratığa eğilen Pasqal'ın matkabının vızıltısı, kulağa öfkeli ve hiddetli geliyor. Tekno Rahip'in sesi, ilahi ceza vaatleriyle lav gibi kaynıyor.{/n} "Döngü'nün süreği bozulsun! Yozlaşmışlık arındırılsın!"
languages.original_text: "Request approved as doctrinally correct." {n}Pasqal leans over the creature and the drill whirrs with wrath and fury. The Tech-Priest's voice boils like lava, ringing with the promise of divine punishment:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued, let corruption be purged!"

traits.locale_text: "Talebin öğretilerle uyumlu olduğu onaylandı." {n}Pasqal yaratığa eğiliyor ve matkabının vızıltısı kulağa öfkeli ve hiddetli geliyor. Tekno Rahip'in sesi, ilahi ceza vaatleriyle, lav gibi kaynıyor.{/n} "Döngü'nün süreği bozulsun! Yozlaşmışlık arındırılsın!"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
